short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a tool to manage large amount of data to translation systems

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a tool to easy and team manage a lot of languages in application development. And export to CVS and JSON formats to use in a lot of applications.
This originally made to use in Godot Game Engine, but a lot of engines and frameworks can use it.
